resources.string: (ἔπος - a "word", a "story") is a variety of literary family(equally with a lyric poetry and drama), that tells about events that allegedly took place in the past(as if came true in actual fact and remembered by retell).
large on a volume and difficult after a structure epic work important and difficult public processes are widely overcame in that, all-round and numerous personages are shown in development.

epic prosaic work(rarer written in verse) that is characterized an unilinear plot, and after the breadth of scope of the vital phenomena and in depth their opening an intermediate place will take a seat between a novel and story.
small prosaic work a plot of that is base on certain(rarely a few) episode from one(sometimes a few) life to the personage.

short folklore or literary narrative work of instructive character, oriented mainly to the allegoric form of leading to of maintenance of ethic values of existence
folk conversation or recital is of some events or life of people, obvolute fabulousness, fantasy
ancient folk story about the phenomena of nature, historical events and others like that or fantastic recitals of Gods, adorable heroes, imaginary creatures.
folklore narrative work about invented, and often and fantastic events..

(грец. lyrikós - lyre; work executed under accompaniment of lyre) - one of three luing-ins of fiction and art in that in form естетизованих experiencing essence of human existence is comprehended; does not have a sharp-edged plot‚ for her characteristic verse form‚ plenty of artistic facilities‚ high level of emotionality.
verse of lyric or lyrico-epic character, melodious after the intonation picture and intended for singing.
small poetic work written with a ритмізованою language, mostly with rhyming of lines
verse, that expresses the elevated feelings, caused by important historical events, activity of historical persons.
solemn song accepted as a state or social symbol; a piece of music of solemn character is in the, symphonic, choral opera.

it is work of meditation character, sad key, poetic with a plot basis of that is an emotional reaction on certain events, situation, psychical impulses(it is heard, mentioned, пережите) or certain emotional state of lyric "Я", that is overcame by a melancholy, sorrow, even suffering.
(дав.-гр. δρᾶμα it is a "action", "act", "action") - one of literary luing-ins, that represents the world in form action, mostly intended for a stage embodiment.
